author: Anonymous Comp
title: using stepper
question:
Hi, I wanted to see the each step of function , 
but stepper doesn't seem to work on BST model
is there any reason for that?  or is there any other way to see each step of function?  it gets so confusing
instructor_answer:
So here's how I figured this out, just FYI. 
Once you posted the link I downloaded the file and replicated the error.
Then I commented out a large part of the file.
And tried to step again.
And kept up the 2, 3 cycle until the error went away.  Then I started
Uncommenting stuff 
and trying to step
and kept up that cycle until I had the one thing that actually causes the error.
It seems to be the templates.  I'm guessing the ... in the template is confusing the stepper.  This is quite surprising since ... is part of the infrastructure the Dr Racket team developed.
Would you like to submit a problem report for this directly?  If so, go to the Help menu > Having and Issue? item.
If not let us know and we will submit it.
